arts.ttl: Aston Villa agree to sign former Real Madrid star Marco Asensio on loan from PSG until the end of the season
arts.sum: SIMON JONES AND TOM COLLOMOSSE: The Spain international is under contract with the Parisians until June 2026. He has been at PSG since July 2023 when he arrived from Real Madrid .

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Spurs swoop in on Wolves' Danso move
arts.sum: The 29-year-old is said to be set to travel to England on Sunday to complete a loan move until the end of the season to the Premier League club, who have agreed to cover his salary in full. Tottenham have reportedly muscled in and signed Wolves target Kevin Danso, while Aston Villa are nearing a deal for PSG winger Marco Asensio .

arts.ttl: Cunha signs new Wolves deal to end transfer talk
arts.sum: Brazil international Matheus Cunha has signed a new 4½-year contract with Wolverhampton Wanderers, the Premier League club announced on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Spurs hijack Danso deal as defender snubs Wolves
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur have hijacked a move to sign Lens defender Kevin Danso, despite Wolves seemingly being on the verge of signing the player.

arts.ttl: Cunha signs new contract at Wolves
arts.sum: Brazilian forward Matheus Cunha has signed a contract extension at Wolverhampton Wanderers, to keep him at the club until 2029. He has gone on to make 72 Premier League appearances for Wolves so far, netting 25 goals - he's only the second player to reach that milestone for the club, after Raul Jimenez who eventually scored 40 before joining Fulham.

arts.ttl: Cunha hints at Wolves stay with goal celebration
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha wraps up Wolves' win against Aston Villa, then hints in his goal celebration that he is staying after being linked with a move away.

This term the 25-year-old has kicked on, finding a new home on the left behind Jorgen Strand Larsen, and becoming the first player to earn a treble nomination for the same Premier League Goal of the Month award in November. Wolves top scorer Matheus Cunha has committed his long-term future to the club, signing a new four-and-a-half year deal at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Tottenham reach agreement with Lens for Wolves’ target Kevin Danso
arts.sum: According to an update from Fabrice Hawkins, Tottenham Hotspur have secured an agreement with RC Lens for Kevin Danso (26). Tottenham are taking a chance this winter to try and…

arts.ttl: 'We played as a team with a true spirit'
arts.sum: Pereira’s side have now ended a run of four winless matches and the head coach left Molineux on Saturday evening in positive spirit, knowing how important the three points were for his side. We played as a block defending, we understood the spaces to create a chance to score, and most important, we played as a team with a true spirit, working together, suffering together in some moments, but I think we deserved the result.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa lose Ollie Watkins to injury as they slip to defeat at Wolves
arts.sum: Goals from Jean-Ricner Bellegarde and Matheus Cunha settled the contest.
